name: .K
summary: Learn about .K files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
Microsoft Visual Studio Code with KFramework Support extension

instructions: You can open a K file with Microsoft Visual Studio Code (multiplatform), Vim (Linux), GNU Emacs (multiplatform), or any other text or source code editor.

K's developer, Runtime Verification, maintains VSCode, Vim, and Emacs extensions that make editing K files in those programs easier. For information on how to download these extensions, refer to the K Framework's official documentation.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .k file in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
images.caption: K file open in Microsoft Visual Studio Code
